shadow_stalker.name: Shadow Stalker
shadow_stalker.description: A deadly assassin who thrives on critical strikes. Crit chance bonuses are doubled, and landing a crit deals 1.5x final damage but missing a crit deals only 0.75x damage.

the_colossus.name: The Colossus
the_colossus.description: An unstoppable titan who grows stronger with vitality. Health and regen from gear increased by 25%, all healing amplified by 25%, and gains 10% damage per 100 max HP.

the_hoarder.name: The Hoarder
the_hoarder.description: A treasure hunter who becomes unstoppable with enough loot. Gains +5% rarity find and +10% XP gain per 2 artifacts. All stats from gear increased by 25%.
